trans-unit.source: Provides services for XAML serialization by XAML designers or other callers that require advanced serialization.
trans-unit.target: 为要求高级序列化的 XAML 设计器或其他调用方进行的 XAML 序列化提供服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager> attempts to optimize access to services that are called frequently during the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager>会尝试优化对经常在序列化过程中调用的服务的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager> is also used as an input for certain specialized `ShouldSerialize` methods on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and for an overload of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager>还用作输入某些专用`ShouldSerialize`方法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]类，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和的重载<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer implementation to use as basis for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 用作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" /> 的基础的 XML 编写器实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML writer mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 XAML 编写器模式。

trans-unit.source: Not a valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriterMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriterMode" /> 枚举的有效成员。
